C

c - Variable in class Controller
Stores the color white.
checkWin(int, int, int) - Method in class Controller
Checks the board for a winner.
checkWin(int, int, int) - Method in class Model
Checks for a winner of the game.
chooseColorOnePlayer() - Method in class Controller
Allows the single user, who is playing against the computer, to choose their symbol color.
chooseColorTwoPlayer() - Method in class Controller
Allows each of the two players to choose their symbol color.
closeConnection() - Method in class Database
Closes the connection to the database.
COLOR - Static variable in class Database
The label for the color column in the database.
color - Variable in class GameStats
A string representation of the color chosen by the user.
COLUMNS - Static variable in class Model
The number of columns on the game board.
computerChoice(int, int) - Method in class Model
This method generates a random point for the computer to place "O" on the board, based on the user's previous move.
computerPlaying - Variable in class Controller
Used to determine the game mode, against a friend or the computer.
connection - Variable in class Database
An object of class Connection that allows us to connect to the database.
CONNECTION_URL - Static variable in class Database
The connection URL.
contentPanel - Variable in class View
JPanel to hold components of the GUI.
Controller - Class in <Unnamed>
The Controller class handles the action Listeners for all JButtons and controls what the View class displays on the GUI.
Controller(Model) - Constructor for class Controller
The constructor creates a View object to begin the game and displays the opening message.
controller - Variable in class View
An object of class Controller.
createStatsTable() - Method in class Database
Creates a table that holds game stats.
